job_history.work_description: Serves as an advisor for managers on issues related to all discipline. Assists in analyzing barriers to performance and devises a strategy to meet challenges regarding performance expectations. Counsels staff and management to consistently and efficiently apply policies to people-based issues in compliance with state/federal law.

Manage a team of 4 Executives, 4 Assistants, 20 Supervisors, and 120 department Associates. Create an effective work environment by developing a common vision, setting clear objectives, expecting teamwork, recognizing outstanding performance and maintaining open communications.
Manage all aspects of inventory control for 2 Divisions and 16 Stores in 3 states. Develop merchandise assortment plans to meet market by market needs and maximize sales and gross margins.

skills.name: Leadership
skills.explanation: Has extensive experience in leadership roles, including managing large teams and developing strategies to meet performance expectations, indicating expert-level mastery.

skills.name: Team Management
skills.explanation: Has successfully managed teams of varying sizes, including a team of 4 Executives, 4 Assistants, 20 Supervisors, and 120 department Associates, showing expert-level proficiency.

skills.name: Inventory Management
skills.explanation: Has managed all aspects of inventory control for 2 Divisions and 16 Stores in 3 states, suggesting strong proficiency in inventory management.

skills.name: Business Planning
skills.explanation: Has developed merchandise assortment plans to meet market needs and maximize sales and gross margins, indicating strong proficiency in business planning.

skills.name: Communication
skills.explanation: Has maintained open communications with teams and management, suggesting strong proficiency in communication.

skills.name: Performance Management
skills.explanation: Has analyzed barriers to performance and devised strategies to meet challenges regarding performance expectations, indicating strong proficiency in performance management.

skills.name: Compliance
skills.explanation: Has ensured compliance with state/federal law in people-based issues, showing a solid working proficiency in compliance.

skills.name: Human Resources
skills.explanation: Has served as an advisor for managers on issues related to discipline and counseled staff and management on people-based issues, indicating a solid working proficiency in human resources.
